pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, November 22, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, November 22, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:15 p.m.


12:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Bob McLeod, Premier of the Northwest Territories.

Prime Ministerâ€™s Office
Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should gather in the House of Commons Foyer for 12:15 p.m.


2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
